Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-12748 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 7.10.0-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-12748 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 7.10.0-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libvirt is earlier than 7.10.0-11, affected by CVE-2025-12748
